## users variable

Users SDK client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
users: (client: APIClient) => {
    me: {
        get(): Promise<{
            projects: Project[];
            user: User;
            project_member_role_map: Record<`project_${string}`, MemberRole>;
            leap_token: string | null;
        }>;
        pats: {
            create(name: string): Promise<PAT>;
            getAll(): Promise<PAT[]>;
            delete(id: Id<'pat'>): Promise<void>;
        };
    };
}
```
